title: T205 SGC graded cards for trade.
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T205 SGC graded cards for trade.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason
Looking to trade a couple of dupes for some other SGC (preferably) graded T205s.

For value I figured we'd use t205.org valuations give or take a couple of bucks. If there are no takers on a trade then I would consider selling them.

Wyatt Lee SGC 30
James Phelan SGC 40
Frank Baker SGC 20

All three cards have high resolution scans on my registry. Registry shows most of the cards I do have. (Some are being crossed but I'll let you know if I have said cards)

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=33&userset=2697[/url]#

Thanks for looking.
